localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: FlashDrive NoOps app platform handles everything for you while you focus on your product. Made by developers for developers, FlashDrive is compatible with Git deployment (Github, Gitlabs etc...), DockerHub etc... Free backups, SSL certs. and load balancers.
nodes.title: FlashDrive.io - noOps app platform for your apps
nodes.author: Alexandre Gonzales

nodes.excerpt: A simple service to get cute dogs as placeholders for your websites and designs. Just add a width and height to the end of the url.
nodes.title: Place Dog - Cute dogs as placeholders for your websites and designs
nodes.author: Josh Ghent

nodes.excerpt: A simple and elegant desktop application for managing your Laravel applications. - Execute Artisan commands easily in a nice interface. - Tinker with your project in a magical code editor.
nodes.title: Laravel Kit - Desktop Laravel admin panel app with no configuration needs
nodes.author: Tareque Md Hanif

nodes.excerpt: Coder moves software development to your cloud, centralizing an organization's development initiatives and unlocking substantial gains in both developer velocity and enterprise security.
nodes.title: Coder - The developer workspace platform
nodes.author: Nicolas Beauvais

nodes.excerpt: Each week, we find you the single best article to read next for getting better at your job. In our mobile app, you're grouped with people in your role at different companies who are reading the same thing. Features facilitate intimate peer-to-peer learning.
nodes.title: Homeroom - Personalized short-form learning for moving up in tech
nodes.author: Erik Spangenberg

nodes.excerpt: The project aims to provide tools to use during the development process. Generate Lorem Ipsum placeholder texts, custom color dummy images, and videos of different sizes. Use generated content to test the layout until the real content arrives. Give it a try!
nodes.title: ipsm.io - Collection of productivity tools for developers & designers
nodes.author: Arsen Pyuskyulyan

nodes.excerpt: Candid helps companies resume screen applicants to find the best and filter out the rest. Is your resume good enough to pass a resume screening? See if you pass the test by trying our demo on our website by uploading your resume to get automated insights.
nodes.title: Candid Resumes - Unbiased resume screening on autopilot
nodes.author: Ted Chiang

nodes.excerpt: Sharing in Clubhouse should be fast, easy, and convenient. Thatâ€™s where we come in. Pick a hashtag. Share it in your room. Drop a link. Drop a question. Dropit.
nodes.title: Dropit for Clubhouse - Sharing in Clubhouse made easy
nodes.author: Paul Shapiro

nodes.excerpt: The perfect addition if you hide the menu bar.
nodes.title: ClockDock - Show the time in your Mac dock
nodes.author: Andreas Storm

nodes.title:
US Family of 6 w/ Income of $150k...

1st Stimulus Check: $4,400
2nd Stimulus Check: $3,600
3rd Stimulus Check: $8,400

Total: $16,400

What if they didn't lose their job/income during pandemic? Not a factor - get the full amount.

How are we paying for this?

Debt, debt, debt... https://t.co/OMTerTiiLl

nodes.excerpt: Developers interested in creating applications and experiences for augmented reality, should check out the Mutrics ARiC open source augmented reality glasses, specifically created for the development process.
nodes.title: Mutrics ARiC - Open source all in one AR glasses for developers

nodes.excerpt: Twiso is a tool that helps you personalize your clubhouse invite page with a click of a button. You can use 3 custom eye-catching templates to unleash uniqueness and grow your audience.
nodes.title: Twiso - Personalize Clubhouse invite page with the click of a button
nodes.author: Dmitry Yeremin

nodes.title: Gonna tell my kids this is the Mona Lisa https://t.co/kwdV15mmre
nodes.author: Ben Carlson

nodes.excerpt: Gravity is a sales intelligence platform helping individuals leverage triggering events that signal when to reach out to prospects. These events include when a prospect changes a job, when a company receives funding or when a company is growing quickly.
nodes.title: Gravity - Reach out to prospects at the right time, every time
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Hypernotes is a knowledge management app with bi-directional linking, outlining, and super-powered collaboration features.
nodes.title: Hypernotes - Create, share, and understand knowledge in a new way
nodes.author: Martin Welker

nodes.excerpt: Blogstreak is the tool library for your blog. If you want nice clap and comments for your static blog then look no further blogstreak has the answer. Blogstreak using latest webcomponent technology so it's highly customisable.
nodes.title: Blogstreak - All things needed for running static blog
nodes.author: Raja Simon

nodes.title: US Inflation Expectations hit their highest levels in over 12 years as the federal government is set to issue another 2 trillion in debt while the federal reserve creates money out of thin air to buy it. (This is not the Onion, it's actually happening) https://t.co/swyNXiTmYJ
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

nodes.excerpt: uPaste for Mac will record and organize your copy/paste history automatically. Then you can use your pasteboard content anytime, any where with elegant beautiful UI.
nodes.title: uPaste - Smart clipboard manager for Mac
nodes.author: ChengHao Wu

nodes.title: One definition of inflation is "too much money chasing too few goods." We're borrowing trillions of dollars to send free money to over a hundred million people who never lost their job/income during the pandemic - for a third time. If this doesn't create inflation, nothing will. https://t.co/eFLT2fiKgo
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

sharedContent.title: The surge in US inflation expectations continues unabated, highest since 2008... https://t.co/SOHodv1Ye6
sharedContent.author: Charlie Bilello

nodes.excerpt: Animate your layers and present your art in a whole new dimension! âœ¨ Float transforms static and flat artworks into moving creations. Your masterpieces deserve to be shown in the most fun and engaging way.
nodes.title: Float - Bring your art to life
nodes.author: Bobby Anderson

nodes.excerpt: warpAR is a free augmented reality app for iOS that lets you distort the textures of the real world. Tap and drag to reshape buildings or turn murals into swirls of color using a set of liquify tools.
nodes.title: warpAR - Distort real world textures using augmented reality
nodes.author: Matt Bierner

nodes.excerpt: Powerful mockup generator that lets you seamlessly mix and match different hand models with devices and backgrounds. Works on the macOS, Windows and Linux. Also available as a https://www.figma.com/c/plugin/786250770157843670/Mockuuups-Studio.
nodes.title: Mockuuups Studio 3.0 - Mockup generator with diverse hands & endless possibilities
nodes.author: David Stefanides

nodes.excerpt: Meet Red: the only full-featured, professional Redis client written from the ground-up for the Mac! Red provides a powerful yet wonderfully simple interface to interact with Redis.
nodes.title: Red - A powerful and beautiful Redis client for Mac
nodes.author: Stephen C. Mitchell
